text: Code-switching is the use of more than one language in speech. Code-switching or Code Switch may also refer to: * Code Switch, a race and culture outlet and weekly podcast from National Public Radio in the United States * Code switching (football), players who have converted from one football code to another ==See also== * Code (disambiguation) * Code-mixing, the mixing of two or more languages or language varieties * Macaronic language, text using a mixture of languages * Switch (disambiguation) * Switching (disambiguation)
title: Code-switching (disambiguation)
